-- Shortcut handling
1 online program
if record changed
END VALIDATION
cancel answer ='N'
cancel answer <>'N'
if no record create and no record exist leave id-numbers
END CANCEL
END DELETE
check information code

information code does not exist

registration number)

-- entered DHIC_ID already exist (INFS_INFOCODEMUSTBEUNIQUE = 'Y')

-- and If DHIC_INFS_CODE = "SN"

... Reference number of reinsurance company not allowed on affiliates

-- Reverse factoring tests
... National registration number not allowed for reverse factoring
... Special national registration number not allowed for non reverse factoring
-- Insolvency test (it's only a warning)
END VALIDATION
-- Test if all debtors have the same main reference number
-- Test if main reference number already exists
... in case of same reference number already exists, give error message
-- If DHIC_INFS_CODE = G (ING Grid) and there is no row in GRID where
-- GRID_ID = DHIC_ID and no row in CLNT where CLNT806_ING_GRID_ID = DHIC_ID

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (11,0)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBH = :2

select CLNT203_OFFICE from :1/CLNT where exists (select * from :1/DEBC where DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DEBH = :2 and DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null) group by CLNT203_OFFICE

Text.val: If a new DHIC row is added or modified
with DHIC_INFS_CODE = ST and DEBH_CODECREDITLIMIT = 3
If a DHIC row is deleted and DHIC_INFS_CODE = ST
